mapper.select: SELECT M.MNAME, P.PNAME, S.SID, S.SNAME, S.SADDRESS, S.EMAIL, S.SPHONE, S.ENTER_DATE, S.GRADE, S.TERM, S.SBIRTH, S.SGENDER, S.DISABLED, FIND_CODE_NAME(300, S.SSTATUS) STUDENT_STATUS FROM MAJOR M, STUDENTS S, PROFESSOR P WHERE M.MCODE = S.MCODE AND S.MCODE = P.MCODE AND P.POSITION = '001' AND S.SID = #{sid}

SELECT M.TOTAL, M.RANK, S.GRADE, L.LYEAR, L.TERM, I.LNAME, I.CREDIT, FIND_CODE_NAME(100, I.DCODE) DIVISION FROM SCORE_MANA M, STUDENTS S, LECTURE L, LECTURE_INFO I WHERE M.SID = S.SID AND M.OPENNUM = L.OPENNUM AND L.LNUM = I.LNUM AND S.SID = #{sid}
